content.question: While vacationing at the beach Max watches a movie in which a shark is sighted in the ocean. The next afternoon Max is standing in shallow water at the beach and feels something glide past him in the water. He immediately runs back to shore while yelling a warning to fellow swimmers. Which cognitive process is contributing to his reaction?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
